mapper.select: SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM(SELECT optionNo, optionName, optionValue FROM optionBase WHERE categoryNo=#{categoryNo} ORDER BY optionNo)B ORDER BY rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO optionBase (optionNo, optionName, optionValue, categoryNo) VALUES (optionNo_seq.nextval, #{optionName}, #{optionValue}, #{categoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT c.categoryName, d.categoryDetailName FROM categoryBase c, categoryDetail d WHERE 1=1 AND c.categoryNo = d.categoryNo AND categoryMapNo = #{categoryMapNo}
SELECT categoryMapNo, categoryDetailName, categoryNo FROM categoryDetail WHERE 1=1 AND categoryNo = #{categoryNo}
SELECT categoryName FROM categoryBase WHERE categoryNo=#{categoryNo}
SELECT categoryDetailName FROM categoryDetail WHERE categoryMapNo=#{categoryDetailNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (productNo, categoryMapNo, shopNo, productName, productContent, originPrice, price, productOrigin, enrollDate, selStartDate, selEndDate, selStatus) SELECT productNo_seq.nextval, #{categoryMapNo}, #{shopNo}, #{productName}, #{productContent}, #{originPrice}, #{price}, #{productOrigin}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{selStartDate}, #{selEndDate}, #{selStatus} FROM DUAL A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 0 FROM product WHERE productName=#{productName})
